name: Go With the Flow (SimplyMinty)
description:
Just a simple fun game I made in my free time; only for MAC, WINDOWS and LINUX! 

Released August 27, 2021. No copyright, but pls don't use it and credit it :o

Tryna get it on android soon hopefully. Idk how to convert it to apk o_O

There's only 2 levels now but there will be a lot more in the future...

Sorry if you don't like it, I know it looks kind of crappy and I'm trying to make it look better...and it's my first scratch project lol.

Here's a link to a scratch project if it doesn't work: https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/562228225/fullscreen/

But hopefully it works because I spent a lot of time trying to get the download to work ^-^

You can also play it in your browser (html): (COMING SOON!)

Now enjoy uwu
